data.text: «N xanuntenyi, n bara so n ma sansi yire.
«N nu na xife, kɔnɔ n bɔɲɛ mu xixi,
«N ɲan nu bara n ma dugi ba,
N xanuntenyi naxa a bɛlɛxɛ raso naadɛ longori ra,
N naxa keli alako n xa naadɛ rabi n xanuntenyi bɛ.
N naxa naadɛ rabi n xanuntenyi bɛ,
A xunyi luxi nɛ alɔ xɛɛma fanyi,
A yae rayabu alɔ ganbɛ naxee tixi xure dɛ ra,
A xɛrɛe luxi nɛ alɔ labundɛ yailande,
A bɛlɛxɛ tofan alɔ bɛlɛxɛsolerasoe xɛɛma daaxi,
A sanyi sɛnbɛ gbo alɔ fanye fiixɛ,
A dɛ iɲɔxun, a xa fe birin fan.
